text: @seanspicer @BernieSanders Tip, loser communications guy and bad dancer, it was a "cloture" vote. And he wasn't doing a "political event" they were doing a Coronavirus forum with more than a million tuning in for information we won't get from corp news! Get outta town! Noneya!
